D-score for international comparisons Stef van Buuren 2018-05-29 Preface This is an introductory booklet on the measurement of child development by means of the D-score. The D-score is a one-number summary that quantifies generic neurocognitive development for children with ages 0-4 years. This is the second in a series of three booklets. The series consists of the following titles: D-score for measuring development of children 0-4 years D-score for international comparisons D-score for creating better instruments
